directions: [["Prepare the roast by removing any large pieces of fat and chopping into 2-inch cubes. Season with half of the salt and pepper."],["In a blender, blend together: lime juice, apple cider vinegar, chipotle peppers, adobo, cumin, tomato paste, oregano, cinnamon, onion powder, ground cloves and remaining salt and pepper. Puree until smooth."],["Add beef to instant pot with bay leaves and broth. "],["Cover beef with puree. "],["Cover and cook at high pressure for 60 minutes."],["Shred meat and return to remaining liquid. Serve and enjoy!"],[""],[""],[""],[""]]
